entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:37 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 1:47 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 7.8°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
